author: jof
title: one of the first big figure sets
review:
Ok, its only a small set, but there were not many girl bigfig sets.

Although I don't like the juniorised bigfigs, I will review it in context.

I like the big windows and doors, nice and easy for 2x building.  Door is 6*6*2 so taller & wider than a standard door.

Other pieces are standard parts, with a couple of interesting patteren 2*3 slopes (NOT transfers) a couple of big flowers & 2 clear green cones
